overview:
Before coming to Videology, Mike served as Chief Financial Officer of BDMetrics, a company that provides interactive media tools for the trade show and business-to-business media industry.

Mike served as the initial Chief Financial Officer of Advertising.com serving from 1999 until the company was sold to AOL in 2004. Before that, he spent three years in mergers and acquisitions at Mars & Co., a French strategic consulting organization.

He graduated with honors from the University of Virginia, earning B.S., M.S. and Ph.D. degrees in engineering. Mike is currently the operations manager for Team Jefferson, which builds autonomous mobile robots, which has competed in the 2005 DARPA Desert Challenge and the 2007 DARPA Urban Challenge.
